    • saveTransaction

      public boolean saveTransaction​(Transaction transaction)
      Given transaction is persisted, and updates the balance information of the player.
      Parameters:
      transaction - Transaction detail.
      Returns:
      true if transaction is processed successfully or false.

    • isTransactionWithSameIdExist

      public boolean isTransactionWithSameIdExist​(java.lang.Long transId)
      Checks if any transaction with given id exist in the Transaction.
      Parameters:
      transId - transaction id to check.
      Returns:
      true if transaction with given id exist.

    • getTransactions

      public java.util.List<Transaction> getTransactions​(java.lang.String accountNumber, java.time.Instant start, java.time.Instant end)
      Find all the transactions of the given account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - Account number.
      start - Start time when history is required.
      end - End time till when history is required.
      Returns:
      List of transactions associated with the account number.
